mapper.select: SELECT NO ,WRITER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,ENROLL_DATE ,MODIFY_DATE ,STATUS FROM NOTICE WHERE NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NO ,WRITER_NO ,TITLE ,CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL ,1 ,#{title} ,#{content} )
